nodes.text: The P7 trauma kit was a type of medkit that was manufactured during the waning years of the Galactic Republic by Naescorcom, a company that was based on the planet Genarius in the Cularin system. Circa 21 BBY, a group of freelance agents identified a deadly virus that had been dispersed by the Believers Sith cult on the moon Tilnes and, as a reward for making the discovery, the Metatheran Cartel gave the agents some P7 trauma kits.
